categories: Category:Events during the New Republic Era

nodes.text: An attack on the palace that had once been owned by crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure occurred around 9 ABY when Boba Fett and Fennec Shand stormed the old palace which was under the rule of its new crime lord, Jabba's former majordomo Bib Fortuna. During the attack, Shand first stormed in, shooting every person inside the palace except for Fortuna and his Twi'lek slave, which she freed. As Fortuna watched in horror, Fett walked calmly in and killed him, sitting on the throne with Shand by his side.
The Attack on Jabba's palace first appeared in "Chapter 16: The Rescue" of Jon Favreau's 2019 Disney+ television series The Mandalorian, directed by Peyton Reed and released on December 18, 2020.
